ygData.subject: Re: Evil eyes
ygData.msgSnippet: i ve been charmed before by them as my druid....happened to have sow memmed, and i was casting it on the eye and it s pet while i was charmed......very evil i
ygData.messageBody:
i've been charmed before by them as my druid....happened to have sow memmed,
and i was casting it on the eye and it's pet while i was charmed......very evil
i might add....

(\/)ystix

Harry Katz wrote:

> From: Harry Katz <hkatz@...>
>
> when you are charmed, you personally cannot control your spells and
> skills....but the thing that charmed you can....they have control of you
> and generally seem to use you(the charmee) as offensively as possible. I'm
> not sure about the cancel magic thing...it should work. Maybe sometimes it
> take 2 cancels to fully remove the affect.
